title.rendered: Code of Conduct Public Hearing & Board of Education Meeting on June 6

content.rendered:
The Board of Education will hold a Code of Conduct public hearing at 6:45 p.m. and a regular meeting at 7 p.m. on June 6.  The public hearing and the Board of Education meeting will be held in the Project Based Learning Center at Saratoga Springs High School. 

Click here to view a draft of the 2024-2025 Code of Conduct.

Meeting agendas and minutes are posted through BoardDocs.
